meanings.definition: An amino acid formed during the metabolism of methionine.
meanings.sent1: Homocysteine is an important building block for proteins in our body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors measure homocysteine levels to assess overall health.
meanings.sent3: When homocysteine went to the gym, it pumped up its amino acid muscles.
meanings.sent4: The role of homocysteine in the body is like a key player in a complex chemical orchestra.
meanings.sent5: Picture homocysteine as a tiny worker tirelessly constructing protein structures.

meanings.definition: A compound that can be found in the blood and is associated with increased risk of heart disease.
meanings.sent1: High levels of homocysteine may indicate heart disease risk.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying ways to lower homocysteine levels for heart health.
meanings.sent3: Homocysteine and heart disease had a serious conversation about blood health.
meanings.sent4: In the bloodstream, homocysteine can act like a silent troublemaker.
meanings.sent5: Imagine homocysteine as a sneaky character lurking in the blood vessels.
